title: Manager, Merchandise Branding - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Manager, Merchandise Branding Posted/Updated: 10-19-2015 Brief Job Description: Direct day-to-day communication with Sports/Olympics merchandise vendor. Analysis of inventory including tracking sales and rebate accounts related to our Sports e-store.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
